recovery.title: Recover your account
recovery.description: We can help you recover your account. Just let us know what have you forgotten ?

account.title: Forgot Password
account.description: Enter your user ID and reseller ID for the confirmation of your account.

pin.title: Forgot Pin
pin.description: Enter your MSISDN for your account confirmation.

password.title: Forgot Password
password.description: Do you want to receive the authentication code via email or sms or do you want to contact customer support?

pin.title: Forgot Pin
pin.description: Do you want to receive the authentication code via email or sms or do you want to contact customer support?

password.title: Forgot Password
password.description: Kindly enter the OTP that has been sent to you via SMS.

pin.title: Forgot Pin
pin.description: Kindly enter the OTP that has been sent to you via SMS.

pin.title: Reset Pin
pin.description: OTP verified. Please enter your new pin and save.

password.title: Reset Password
password.description: OTP verified. Please enter your new password and save.
